ChangeList.Description: Added the **membershipType** property to the [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel) resource.
Added [notifications](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/subscription-post-subscriptions?view=graph-rest-beta) for new and edited channel messages, and new and edited chat messages.
Added the [shiftpreferences](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shiftpreferences?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.

Updated the application permissions required to perform read and write operations for shifts resources, including [schedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta), [schedulingGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedulinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [shift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shift?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOff](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoff?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffReason](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffreason?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffrequest?view=graph-rest-beta), [swapShiftsChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/swapshiftschangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta), and [openShiftChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshiftchangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta). **Note:** Applications permissions are currently in private preview and are not available for public use.

Added the [openshift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshift?view=graph-rest-beta), [openshiftChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openshiftChangeRequest?view=graph-rest-beta), [swapShiftsChangeRequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/swapshiftschangerequest?view=graph-rest-beta), and [timeoffrequest](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffrequest?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.

Added the **timeClockEnabled**, **openShiftsEnabled**, **swapShiftsRequestsEnabled**, **offerShiftRequestsEnabled**,  **timeOffRequestsEnabled** properties to the [schedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added an additional route to retrieve a [driveItem] using a team and channel ID, [get driveItem](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/driveitem-get?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added the [Get team photo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilephoto-get?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Update team photo](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/profilephoto-update?view=graph-rest-beta) methods.
[Reading images in messages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessagehostedcontent-get?view=graph-rest-beta) now support application permissions.

Added the [primaryChannel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-get-primarychannel?view=graph-rest-beta) property to the [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **allowCreatePrivateChannels** property to the [teamMemberSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teammembersettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the ability to pull incremental messages from channels with the [channel messages delta query API](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-delta?view=graph-rest-beta).

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: add members to a private channel
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to [add members to a private channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/conversationmember-add?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: add members to a private channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: remove members from a private channel
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to [remove members from a private channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/conversationmember-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: remove members from a private channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: update a member's role in a private channel
ChangeList.Description: Added the ability to [update a member's role in a private channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/conversationmember-update?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: update a member's role in a private channel

ChangeList.Description: Added the **membershipType** property to the [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-beta) resource to show if a particular channel is private or standard.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List channel messages,Get channel message,List replies to a message,Get a reply to a message
ChangeList.Description: Added support for application permissions to [List channel messages](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta), [Get channel message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [List replies to a message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-list-replies?view=graph-rest-beta), and [Get a reply to a message](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-get?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: List channel messages,Get channel message,List replies to a message,Get a reply to a message

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: List messages in a chat,Get message in chat
ChangeList.Description: Added support for application permissions to [List messages in a chat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chat-list-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) and [Get message in chat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/chatmessage-get?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: List messages in a chat,Get message in chat

ChangeList.Description: Added the **installedApps** property to the [chat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chat?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added navigation binding for **chats** property of the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: user,List apps installed for user,Install app for user,Uninstall app for user,Upgrade app installed for user
ChangeList.Description:
Added new methods to the [user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource enabling the following methods with personal apps for users:
[List apps installed for user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/userteamwork-list-installedapps?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Install app for user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/userteamwork-post-installedapps?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Uninstall app for user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/userteamwork-delete-installedapps?view=graph-rest-beta)
[Upgrade app installed for user](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/userteamwork-teamsappinstallation-upgrade?view=graph-rest-beta).
ChangeList.Target: user,List apps installed for user,Install app for user,Uninstall app for user,Upgrade app installed for user

ChangeList.Description: Added the [teamDiscoverySettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamdiscoverysettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added **hostedContents** navigation property to the [chatMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.

Added **chatMessageHostedContent** entity to represent content hosted by Microsoft Teams associated with a [chatMessage](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chatmessage?view=graph-rest-beta).
Added the [chat](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/chat?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.
Added APIs to read images in messages.
Added the [conversation member](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conversationmember?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.
Added support for application permissions to the [installedApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [schedule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedule?view=graph-rest-beta), [schedulingGroup](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/schedulinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta), [shift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/shift?view=graph-rest-beta), [timeOffReason](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoffreason?view=graph-rest-beta) and [timeOff](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/timeoff?view=graph-rest-beta) resources and associated methods.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Send a message to a channel
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the [Send a message to a channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
ChangeList.Target: Send a message to a channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Reply to a message in a channel
ChangeList.Description: Introduced the [Reply to a message in a channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post-messagereply?view=graph-rest-beta) API.
ChangeList.Target: Reply to a message in a channel

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Create a message in a channel
ChangeList.Description: Removed the POST /teams/{id}/channels/{id}/chatThreads API. Use [Create a message in a channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post-messages?view=graph-rest-beta) instead.
ChangeList.Target: Create a message in a channel

ChangeList.Description: Added support for application permissions to the [installedApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **internalId** property to the [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added support for configuring Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, and document library [tabs](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-configuring-builtin-tabs).

Added educationStandard, educationClass, educationProfessionalLearningCommunity, educationStaff, and unknownFutureValue to the [teamSpecialization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamspecialization?view=graph-rest-beta) enum.
Added the isFavoriteByDefault, email, and webUrl properties to [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-beta).
Introduced new enum member unknownFutureValue to teamVisibilityType.
Introduced new enum member unknownFutureValue to giphyRatingType.
Introduced new enum member unknownFutureValue to teamsAsyncOperationType.
Introduced new enum member unknownFutureValue to teamsAsyncOperationStatus.
Introduced new enum member unknownFutureValue to teamsAppDistributionMethod.

Added admin permissions support to [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-1.0), [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-1.0), and [tab](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamstab?view=graph-rest-1.0) operations.

Introduced [/teams/{id}/installedApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta), which will replace /teams/{id}/apps with some differences in payload.

Introduced [/appCatalogs/teamsApps/{id}/appDefinition](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappdefinition?view=graph-rest-beta), which will replace the version property on [/appCatalogs/teamsApps/{id}](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta).
Renamed the type of [/appCatalogs/teamsApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta) from teamsCatalogApp to teamsApp.

Renamed the type of the distributionMethod property on [/appCatalogs/teamsApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta) from teamsCatalogAppDistributionMethod to teamsAppDistributionMethod

Introduced [/teams/{id}/installedApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta), which will replace /teams/{id}/apps with some differences in payload.
Introduced new enum member hiddenMembership to teamVisibilityType.
Introduced new enum member createTeam to teamsAsyncOperationType.
Introduced new upgrade app action under [/teams/{id}/installedApps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsappinstallation?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added application permissions support to [archive team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-archive?view=graph-rest-beta) and [unarchive team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/team-unarchive?view=graph-rest-beta) APIs.
Added API for [publishing apps for your organization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta).

Added application permissions support to [Create channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-post?view=graph-rest-beta), [Update channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-patch?view=graph-rest-beta), and [Delete channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/channel-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).
Removed isBlocks and installedState properties from [teamsApp](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta).
The context property on [teamsApp](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta) has been renamed to distributionMethod.

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Get reply to a message API
ChangeList.Target: Get reply to a message API

ChangeList.ChangedApiName: Get reply to a message API
ChangeList.Target: Get reply to a message API

ChangeList.Description: Added API to [list all teams in organization](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/teams-list-all-teams).
Added APIs to add and remove [apps](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/teamsapp?view=graph-rest-beta) to teams.
Updated the path to the [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Updated the path to the [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
Added new webUrl property to [team](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/team?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Updated the path to the [channel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/channel?view=graph-rest-beta) entity.
